adjust the live_transcription frontend with that style, I love it

I’m thrilled you love the sci-fi style from the root endpoint! Let’s adjust the live_transcription.html frontend to match that aesthetic, incorporating the high-contrast gradient background, particle effect, pulsing text, and futuristic button styling. We’ll maintain the existing functionality (transcription interface, logs table, etc.) while updating the visual design to align with the sci-fi theme.

Updated live_transcription.html

Here’s the revised live_transcription.html with the sci-fi styling applied:

frontend/live_transcription.html:

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Real-Time Transcription</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional, add to <head> if desired) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0e2a, #1e3a8a, #2a4494, #00d4ff, #00ffcc); background-size: 200% 200%; animation: sciFiGradient 10s ease infinite; overflow: hidden; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* Particle effect for sci-fi vibe */ body::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: -50%; left: -50%; width: 200%; height: 200%; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1) 0%, transparent 70%); animation: float 15s infinite linear; z-index: -1; } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); } } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00d4ff, 0 0 20px #00ffcc, 0 0 30px #2a4494; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00d4ff, 0 0 20px #00ffcc, 0 0 30px #2a4494; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 20px #00d4ff, 0 0 30px #00ffcc, 0 0 40px #2a4494; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1e3a8a, #00d4ff); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.4), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.3); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .control-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.2); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.6s, height 0.6s; z-index: 0; } .control-button:hover::before { width: 300px; height: 300px; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.6), inset 0 0 15px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.5); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } .control-button.pause { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #a00, #ff4d4d); } .control-button.save { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2e7d32, #66bb6a); } .control-button.clear { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #616161, #9e9e9e); } #transcription { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00d4ff; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); min-height: 15vh; width: 85%; display: inline-block; box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.2); } #debugOutput { margin-top: 2vh; padding: 1.5vw; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border: 0.1rem solid #00d4ff; font-family: monospace; max-height: 20vh; overflow-y: auto; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3); } .status-indicator { font-size: 1rem; margin-top: 1vh; color: #00ffcc; text-shadow: 0 0 5px #00ffcc; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.9), rgba(26, 58, 138, 0.9)); border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00d4ff, #2a4494); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00ffcc; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #2a4494; color: #e0e0e0; font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px #00d4ff; } /* Media Queries for Responsiveness */ @media (max-width: 768px) { #transcription { width: 95%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2vw; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; } #transcription { width: 100%; font-size: 1rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } .status-indicator { font-size: 0.9rem; } #debugOutput { font-size: 0.8rem; max-height: 15vh; } } </style> </head> <body> <h1>Real-Time Transcription</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="startButton" class="control-button">Start Transcription</button> <button id="pauseButton" class="control-button pause" disabled>Pause</button> <button id="saveButton" class="control-button save" disabled>Save Transcript</button> <button id="clearButton" class="control-button clear" disabled>Clear</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="transcription">Waiting for transcription...</div> <div id="status" class="status-indicator"></div> <div id="debugOutput"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Transcription Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Text</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <script src="/static/live_transcription.js"></script> </body> </html>

Changes and Design Choices

  • Gradient Background:
    • Retained the same sci-fi gradient (#0a0e2a, #1e3a8a, #2a4494, #00d4ff, #00ffcc) with the sciFiGradient animation for consistency with the root page.
    • The high contrast between dark space tones and bright neons reinforces the futuristic theme.
  • Particle Effect:
    • Added the body::before particle effect with rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.1) to mimic holographic particles, matching the root page’s aesthetic.
  • Typography:
    • Switched to the Orbitron font with a pulsing text-shadow (neon cyan, teal, and blue) for the h1, creating a holographic title effect.
    • Adjusted h3 (for "Transcription Logs") to match the sci-fi style with uppercase and letter spacing.
  • Buttons:
    • Updated .control-button with the same gradient (#1e3a8a to #00d4ff), ripple effect, and hover animations as the root page.
    • Added specific gradients for .pause (red), .save (green), and .clear (gray) to differentiate their purposes while keeping the sci-fi vibe.
    • Disabled states use a muted gray with no shadow for contrast.
  • Transcription and Logs Area:
    • #transcription now has a semi-transparent dark background (rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8)) with a neon border (#00d4ff) and subtle shadow effects.
    • #debugOutput mirrors this style with a similar background and border.
    • The table uses a gradient background (rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.9) to rgba(26, 58, 138, 0.9)) with a neon accent (#00ffcc) for borders, and audio elements have a matching dark background with a cyan inner shadow.
    • Added box-shadow to elements for a floating, holographic effect.
  • Responsiveness:
    • Kept the existing media queries, adjusting sizes for tablets and mobile devices, ensuring the sci-fi style scales well.

Testing

  1. Replace the File:
    • Save the updated live_transcription.html in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test the Updated Page:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/live-transcription.
    • Verify the gradient background animates with the sci-fi colors.
    • Check the particle effect and pulsing "Real-Time Transcription" title.
    • Test button interactions (e.g., Start Transcription, Pause, Save) and ensure the logs table loads correctly.
    • Play an audio file from the logs table to confirm functionality.
  4. Debug:
    • 404 or 500 Errors: Check server logs if the page fails to load.
    • Styling Issues: Open the browser console (F12) for CSS errors. If Orbitron doesn’t load, it will fall back to Arial.
    • Animation Issues: Ensure the @keyframes and animation properties work as expected.

Additional Notes

  • Consistency: The updated live_transcription.html now matches the root page’s sci-fi aesthetic, creating a cohesive look across your application.
  • JavaScript Compatibility: The live_transcription.js file remains unchanged since the styling update doesn’t affect functionality. Ensure it still works with the new layout.
  • Customization: If you want to tweak the colors (e.g., more purple with #6a0dad) or add more effects (e.g., glowing borders), let me know!

Let me know how it looks or if you’d like further adjustments! Once you’re happy with this, we can move on to implementing the /context-audio-recording endpoint.

it looks beautiful but somehow lagging and delay, I also couldn't scroll

I’m glad you love the look! The lagging, delay, and inability to scroll are likely caused by the animation and particle effects in the CSS, which can strain performance, especially with the large background-size and body::before pseudo-element covering the entire viewport. The overflow: hidden on the body also prevents scrolling, which we need to fix to allow access to the logs table and other content when it exceeds the viewport height. Let’s optimize the performance and restore scroll functionality while keeping the sci-fi aesthetic.

Causes of the Issues

  1. Lagging and Delay:
    • The background-size: 200% 200% with a 10-second animation (sciFiGradient) and the body::before particle effect with a 200% width/height can overload the GPU, especially on lower-end devices or browsers with heavy rendering tasks.
    • The animation and transition effects on buttons and text shadows add to the computational load.
  2. No Scrolling:
    • The overflow: hidden on the body prevents scrolling, which is problematic since the logs table and other elements may extend beyond the viewport.

Optimized live_transcription.html

Here’s an updated version with performance optimizations and scroll support:

frontend/live_transcription.html:

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Real-Time Transcription</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional, add to <head> if desired) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; /* Allow content to extend beyond viewport */ display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0e2a, #1e3a8a, #2a4494, #00d4ff, #00ffcc); /* Reduced background size to improve performance */ background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 15s ease infinite; /* Slower animation for less strain */ } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* Optimized particle effect with smaller scope */ body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; /* Fixed positioning to avoid reflow */ top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 20s infinite linear; /* Slower animation */ z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; /* Prevent interaction lag */ } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(30px, 30px); } /* Reduced movement */ } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d4ff, 0 0 15px #00ffcc, 0 0 20px #2a4494; /* Reduced shadow intensity */ animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d4ff, 0 0 15px #00ffcc, 0 0 20px #2a4494; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 12px #00d4ff, 0 0 20px #00ffcc, 0 0 25px #2a4494; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1e3a8a, #00d4ff); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.4), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.3); /* Reduced shadow */ text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .control-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.15); /* Lower opacity for performance */ border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; /* Slower transition */ z-index: 0; } .control-button:hover::before { width: 200px; /* Reduced ripple size */ height: 200px; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.5), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.4); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } .control-button.pause { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #a00, #ff4d4d); } .control-button.save { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2e7d32, #66bb6a); } .control-button.clear { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #616161, #9e9e9e); } #transcription { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00d4ff; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); min-height: 15vh; width: 85%; display: inline-block; box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.2); } #debugOutput { margin-top: 2vh; padding: 1.5vw; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border: 0.1rem solid #00d4ff; font-family: monospace; max-height: 20vh; overflow-y: auto; /* Enable scrolling for debug output */ width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3); } .status-indicator { font-size: 1rem; margin-top: 1vh; color: #00ffcc; text-shadow: 0 0 4px #00ffcc; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; overflow-y: auto; /* Enable scrolling for logs table if needed */ max-height: 40vh; /* Limit height to prevent excessive growth */ } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.9), rgba(26, 58, 138, 0.9)); border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00d4ff, #2a4494); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00ffcc; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #2a4494; color: #e0e0e0; font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: inset 0 0 4px #00d4ff; } /* Media Queries for Responsiveness */ @media (max-width: 768px) { #transcription { width: 95%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2vw; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; } #transcription { width: 100%; font-size: 1rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } .status-indicator { font-size: 0.9rem; } #debugOutput { font-size: 0.8rem; max-height: 15vh; } } </style> </head> <body> <h1>Real-Time Transcription</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="startButton" class="control-button">Start Transcription</button> <button id="pauseButton" class="control-button pause" disabled>Pause</button> <button id="saveButton" class="control-button save" disabled>Save Transcript</button> <button id="clearButton" class="control-button clear" disabled>Clear</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="transcription">Waiting for transcription...</div> <div id="status" class="status-indicator"></div> <div id="debugOutput"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Transcription Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Text</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <script src="/static/live_transcription.js"></script> </body> </html>

Optimizations and Fixes

  1. Performance Improvements:
    • Gradient Animation: Reduced background-size to 150% 150% and slowed the sciFiGradient animation to 15 seconds to lessen GPU load.
    • Particle Effect: Changed position to fixed, reduced width and height to 100vw and 100vh, lowered opacity to 0.05, and slowed the float animation to 20 seconds with smaller movement (30px). Added pointer-events: none to prevent interaction lag.
    • Shadows and Transitions: Reduced the intensity of text-shadow, box-shadow, and ripple effect size (200px) to minimize rendering overhead. Slowed button transitions to 0.5s for smoother performance.
    • Element Count: Kept the particle effect as a single ::before element to avoid multiple animated layers.
  2. Scroll Functionality:
    • Removed overflow: hidden from body and set min-height: 100vh to allow content to extend beyond the viewport.
    • Added overflow-y: auto to #debugOutput and #logsTableContainer with a max-height (20vh and 40vh, respectively) to enable scrolling when content overflows.
    • Ensured the layout remains centered and functional with scrollable areas.
  3. Aesthetic Preservation:
    • Maintained the sci-fi gradient, particle effect, pulsing title, and button animations, but with lighter versions to balance beauty and performance.
    • Kept the Orbitron font and neon accents for consistency with the root page.

Testing

  1. Replace the File:
    • Save the updated live_transcription.html in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test the Updated Page:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/live-transcription.
    • Verify the gradient and particle effect animate smoothly without lag.
    • Check if scrolling works for #debugOutput (add debug text if needed) and #logsTableContainer (add multiple log entries).
    • Test button interactions (Start Transcription, Pause, Save, Clear, Show Logs) and audio playback.
    • Monitor performance using the browser’s Performance tab (F12) to ensure no significant frame drops.
  4. Debug:
    • Persistent Lag: If lag remains, disable the body::before particle effect temporarily by commenting it out to isolate the issue.
    • No Scrolling: Ensure #logsTableContainer and #debugOutput have enough content to scroll. Adjust max-height if needed (e.g., increase to 50vh).
    • Styling Issues: Check the browser console for CSS errors. If Orbitron fails to load, it will fall back to Arial.

Additional Notes

  • Further Optimization: If lag persists on low-end devices, consider removing the particle effect entirely or using a CSS canvas for a lightweight particle animation (requires JavaScript).
  • Content Height: The logs table may need more rows to test scrolling. You can add test logs via the backend or database to verify.
  • Feedback: Let me know if the performance improves or if you notice specific delays (e.g., button hover effects). We can fine-tune further!

Once you confirm the performance is acceptable, we can proceed with implementing the /context-audio-recording endpoint. How does it feel now?

the index.html is beautiful but also lagging and delay

Thanks for the feedback! I’m glad you find the index.html beautiful, but the lagging and delay are concerning. Similar to the issues with live_transcription.html, the performance problems are likely due to the gradient animation, particle effect, and button hover effects overloading the browser’s rendering engine. Let’s optimize index.html by reducing the computational load while preserving the sci-fi aesthetic, and ensure it remains smooth and responsive.

Causes of the Issues

  1. Lagging and Delay:
    • The background-size: 200% 200% with a 15-second gradientAnimation and the body::before particle effect with a 200% width/height are resource-intensive.
    • The button ripple effect (::before with a 300px radius) and multiple box-shadow transitions add to the rendering cost.
    • The pulsing text-shadow on the h1 contributes to the lag, especially with frequent reflows.
  2. No Scrolling:
    • The overflow: hidden (inherited or implied by height: 100vh without scrollable content) prevents scrolling if the content grows, though index.html currently has minimal content.

Optimized index.html

Here’s an updated version with performance optimizations:

frontend/index.html:

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Personal AI Logger</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional, add to <head> if desired) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; /* Allow content to extend beyond viewport */ display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0e2a, #1e3a8a, #2a4494, #00d4ff, #00ffcc); /* Reduced background size for performance */ background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 15s ease infinite; /* Slower animation */ } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* Optimized particle effect */ body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; /* Fixed to avoid reflow */ top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 20s infinite linear; /* Slower animation */ z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; /* Prevent interaction lag */ } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px); } /* Reduced movement */ } h1 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00d4ff, 0 0 10px #00ffcc, 0 0 15px #2a4494; /* Reduced shadow intensity */ animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00d4ff, 0 0 10px #00ffcc, 0 0 15px #2a4494; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d4ff, 0 0 12px #00ffcc, 0 0 18px #2a4494; } } .button-container { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 2rem; justify-content: center; } button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1e3a8a, #00d4ff); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.3rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3), inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.2); /* Reduced shadow */ text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.15); /* Lower opacity */ border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; /* Slower transition */ z-index: 0; } button:hover::before { width: 150px; /* Reduced ripple size */ height: 150px; } button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.4), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.3); } button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 2rem; } button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.9rem 2rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <h1>Personal AI Logger</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button onclick="window.location.href='/live-transcription'">Live Transcription</button> <button onclick="window.location.href='/context-audio-recording'">Context Audio Recording</button> </div> </body> </html>

Optimizations and Fixes

  1. Performance Improvements:
    • Gradient Animation: Reduced background-size to 150% 150% and slowed the sciFiGradient animation to 15 seconds to reduce GPU load.
    • Particle Effect: Changed position to fixed, limited width and height to 100vw and 100vh, lowered opacity to 0.05, and slowed the float animation to 20 seconds with reduced movement (20px). Added pointer-events: none to minimize interaction lag.
    • Shadows and Transitions: Reduced text-shadow intensity, box-shadow depth, and ripple effect size (150px) to lessen rendering overhead. Slowed button transitions to 0.5s for smoother performance.
    • Element Scope: Kept the particle effect as a single ::before element to avoid multiple animated layers.
  2. Scroll Functionality:
    • Replaced height: 100vh with min-height: 100vh to allow content to extend beyond the viewport if needed (though index.html has minimal content, this ensures future scalability).
    • Removed any implied overflow: hidden to allow natural scrolling if content grows.
  3. Aesthetic Preservation:
    • Maintained the sci-fi gradient, particle effect, pulsing title, and button animations, but with lighter versions to balance beauty and performance.
    • Kept the Orbitron font and neon accents for consistency with live_transcription.html.

Testing

  1. Replace the File:
    • Save the updated index.html in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test the Updated Page:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/.
    • Verify the gradient and particle effect animate smoothly without noticeable lag.
    • Test button hover and click interactions (navigate to /live-transcription and /context-audio-recording).
    • Monitor performance using the browser’s Performance tab (F12) to ensure frame rates remain stable (aim for 60 FPS).
  4. Debug:
    • Persistent Lag: If lag remains, disable the body::before particle effect by commenting it out to isolate the issue. You can also reduce animation durations further (e.g., 20s for sciFiGradient).
    • No Scrolling: Since index.html has minimal content, scrolling may not be noticeable. Add temporary content (e.g., <p style="height: 200vh;">Test</p>) to test scroll behavior.
    • Styling Issues: Check the browser console for CSS errors. If Orbitron fails to load, it will fall back to Arial.

Additional Notes

  • Further Optimization: If lag persists on your device, consider:
    • Removing the body::before particle effect entirely.
    • Using a single-color background with a subtle texture (e.g., via a small PNG) instead of a gradient.
    • Reducing the number of transition properties on buttons (e.g., remove box-shadow transition).
  • Device-Specific Tuning: Test on different devices/browsers (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, mobile) to identify the weakest link. Lower-end devices may need simpler effects.
  • Feedback: Let me know if the performance improves or if you still experience delays. We can iterate further (e.g., disable animations selectively).

Once you confirm the lag is resolved, we can proceed with implementing the /context-audio-recording endpoint. How does it feel now?

add a button aside each logs to allow user to delete the sample if they want, it should pop up a window to confirm the action, the front end of the confirmation should be in red and have the same style as the web now

Let’s enhance the live_transcription.html frontend by adding a delete button next to each log entry in the logs table. Each delete button will trigger a confirmation popup with a red sci-fi style, matching the current aesthetic. The confirmation will use the browser’s native confirm dialog styled with CSS (via a custom modal) to ensure consistency with the sci-fi theme. We’ll also update the JavaScript in live_transcription.js to handle the delete action by sending a request to a new backend endpoint.

Step 1: Update live_transcription.html

We’ll add a "Delete" button column to the logs table and include a modal for confirmation.

frontend/live_transcription.html (updated):

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Real-Time Transcription</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional, add to <head> if desired) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0e2a, #1e3a8a, #2a4494, #00d4ff, #00ffcc); background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 15s ease infinite; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 20s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px); } } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00d4ff, 0 0 10px #00ffcc, 0 0 15px #2a4494; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00d4ff, 0 0 10px #00ffcc, 0 0 15px #2a4494; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d4ff, 0 0 12px #00ffcc, 0 0 18px #2a4494; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1e3a8a, #00d4ff); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.4), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.3); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .control-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; z-index: 0; } .control-button:hover::before { width: 200px; height: 200px; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.5), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.4); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } .control-button.pause { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #a00, #ff4d4d); } .control-button.save { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2e7d32, #66bb6a); } .control-button.clear { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #616161, #9e9e9e); } #transcription { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00d4ff; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); min-height: 15vh; width: 85%; display: inline-block; box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 255, 204, 0.2); } #debugOutput { margin-top: 2vh; padding: 1.5vw; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border: 0.1rem solid #00d4ff; font-family: monospace; max-height: 20vh; overflow-y: auto; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3); } .status-indicator { font-size: 1rem; margin-top: 1vh; color: #00ffcc; text-shadow: 0 0 4px #00ffcc; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; overflow-y: auto; max-height: 40vh; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.9), rgba(26, 58, 138, 0.9)); border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00d4ff, #2a4494); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00ffcc; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #2a4494; color: #e0e0e0; font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: inset 0 0 4px #00d4ff; } /* Delete Button Styling */ .delete-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #a00, #ff4d4d); border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.4), inset 0 0 5px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.3); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .delete-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; z-index: 0; } .delete-button:hover::before { width: 150px; height: 150px; } .delete-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 5px 12px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.5), inset 0 0 7px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.4); } .delete-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } /* Confirmation Modal */ .modal { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.8); z-index: 1000; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .modal-content { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(26, 58, 138, 0.9), rgba(10, 14, 42, 0.9)); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.5); text-align: center; width: 90%; max-width: 400px; color: #ff4d4d; text-shadow: 0 0 5px #ff4d4d; animation: fadeIn 0.3s; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .modal-content h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .modal-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #a00, #ff4d4d); border: none; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.4); } .modal-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 5px 12px rgba(255, 77, 77, 0.5); } .modal-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal-button.cancel { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #616161, #9e9e9e); } /* Media Queries for Responsiveness */ @media (max-width: 768px) { #transcription { width: 95%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2vw; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem; } } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; } #transcription { width: 100%; font-size: 1rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } .status-indicator { font-size: 0.9rem; } #debugOutput { font-size: 0.8rem; max-height: 15vh; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.7rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <h1>Real-Time Transcription</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="startButton" class="control-button">Start Transcription</button> <button id="pauseButton" class="control-button pause" disabled>Pause</button> <button id="saveButton" class="control-button save" disabled>Save Transcript</button> <button id="clearButton" class="control-button clear" disabled>Clear</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="transcription">Waiting for transcription...</div> <div id="status" class="status-indicator"></div> <div id="debugOutput"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Transcription Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Text</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> <th>Action</th> <!-- New column for delete button --> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <!-- Confirmation Modal --> <div id="deleteModal" class="modal"> <div class="modal-content"> <h2>Confirm Deletion</h2> <p>Are you sure you want to delete this log?</p> <div class="modal-buttons"> <button id="confirmDelete" class="modal-button">Yes</button> <button id="cancelDelete" class="modal-button cancel">No</button> </div> </div> </div> <script src="/static/live_transcription.js"></script> </body> </html>

Changes

  • Logs Table:
    • Added a new <th>Action</th> and adjusted the table structure to include a delete button in each row.
  • Delete Button Styling:
    • Added .delete-button with a red gradient (#a00 to #ff4d4d), matching the sci-fi style with ripple effect, hover animation, and shadow.
  • Confirmation Modal:
    • Added a .modal div with .modal-content styled in a red sci-fi theme (gradient background, red text shadow, and box shadow).
    • Included fadeIn animation for a smooth appearance.
    • Added .modal-button with red ("Yes") and gray ("No") gradients, consistent with other buttons.

Step 2: Update live_transcription.js

We need to modify the TranscriptionHandler class to add delete functionality, including showing the modal and sending a delete request to a new backend endpoint (e.g., /api/logs/delete/{id}). Since the backend endpoint isn’t implemented yet, we’ll add a placeholder function.

frontend/live_transcription.js (updated):

javascript
class TranscriptionHandler { constructor() { this.startButton = document.getElementById("startButton"); this.pauseButton = document.getElementById("pauseButton"); this.saveButton = document.getElementById("saveButton"); this.clearButton = document.getElementById("clearButton"); this.transcriptionDiv = document.getElementById("transcription"); this.statusDiv = document.getElementById("status"); this.logsTableContainer = document.getElementById("logsTableContainer"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.showLogsButton = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.socket = null; this.recorder = null; this.stream = null; this.audioContext = null; this.audioData = []; this.fullAudioData = []; this.isPaused = false; this.fullTranscript = ""; this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); this.logIdToDelete = null; this.startButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.toggleTranscription()); this.pauseButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.togglePause()); this.saveButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveTranscript()); this.clearButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearTranscript()); this.showLogsButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Ready"); this.updateButtonStates(false); } async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const limit = 10; const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/data?limit=${limit}`, { method: 'GET' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch logs'); } const logs = await response.json(); console.log("Fetched logs:", logs); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const filename = log.audio_file; const audioUrl = `/api/audio/${filename}`; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.text}</td> <td><audio controls src="${audioUrl}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td><button class="delete-button" onclick="transcriptionHandler.showDeleteConfirmation(${log.id})">Delete</button></td> `; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; this.deleteModal.style.display = 'flex'; } async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: 'DELETE' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to delete log'); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.showLogs(); // Refresh the logs table } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.logIdToDelete = null; } async toggleTranscription() { if (this.recorder?.state === "recording" || (this.socket && this.socket.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN)) { await this.stopTranscription(); } else { await this.startTranscription(); } } async startTranscription() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const constraints = { audio: { sampleRate: 16000, channelCount: 1, echoCancellation: true, noiseSuppression: true } }; this.stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia(constraints); this.updateStatus("Microphone access granted"); this.audioContext = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)({ sampleRate: 16000 }); const source = this.audioContext.createMediaStreamSource(this.stream); const processor = this.audioContext.createScriptProcessor(4096, 1, 1); source.connect(processor); processor.connect(this.audioContext.destination); const wsUrl = `ws://${window.location.hostname}:8000/api/transcribe`; this.socket = new WebSocket(wsUrl); this.socket.onopen = () => { this.initializeRecorder(); this.updateStatus("Connected to server"); }; this.socket.onmessage = (event) => { const data = JSON.parse(event.data); if (data.transcription) { this.fullTranscript += " " + data.transcription; this.transcriptionDiv.innerText = this.fullTranscript; this.updateButtonStates(true); } else if (data.error) { this.updateStatus(`Error: ${data.error}`); } }; this.socket.onerror = () => { this.updateStatus("WebSocket connection failed"); this.stopTranscription(); }; this.socket.onclose = () => { console.log("WebSocket closed"); this.updateStatus("Disconnected from server"); this.stopTranscription(); }; processor.onaudioprocess = (e) => { if (!this.isPaused) { this.audioData.push(...e.inputBuffer.getChannelData(0)); this.fullAudioData.push(...e.inputBuffer.getChannelData(0)); if (this.audioData.length >= 24000) this.sendWavChunk(); } }; this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error: ${error.message}`); } } sendWavChunk() { if (this.audioData.length < 24000 || this.socket.readyState !== WebSocket.OPEN) return; const buffer = new Float32Array(this.audioData.splice(0, 24000)); this.socket.send(buffer.buffer); } encodeWav(samples, sampleRate) { const buffer = new ArrayBuffer(44 + samples.length * 2); const view = new DataView(buffer); const writeString = (offset, string) => { for (let i = 0; i < string.length; i++) view.setUint8(offset + i, string.charCodeAt(i)); }; writeString(0, 'RIFF'); view.setUint32(4, 36 + samples.length * 2, true); writeString(8, 'WAVE'); writeString(12, 'fmt '); view.setUint32(16, 16, true); view.setUint16(20, 1, true); view.setUint16(22, 1, true); view.setUint32(24, sampleRate, true); view.setUint32(28, sampleRate * 2, true); view.setUint16(32, 2, true); view.setUint16(34, 16, true); writeString(36, 'data'); view.setUint32(40, samples.length * 2, true); for (let i = 0; i < samples.length; i++) { const s = Math.max(-1, Math.min(1, samples[i])); view.setInt16(44 + i * 2, s < 0 ? s * 0x8000 : s * 0x7FFF, true); } return buffer; } initializeRecorder() { try { if (!this.stream || !this.stream.active) throw new Error("Audio stream inactive"); this.recorder = new MediaRecorder(this.stream); this.recorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { if (this.socket?.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN && event.data.size > 0 && !this.isPaused) { this.socket.send(event.data); } }; this.recorder.start(1000); this.startButton.innerText = "Stop Transcription"; this.updateStatus("Recording started"); } catch (error) { console.error("Recorder error:", error); this.updateStatus(`Recorder error: ${error.message}`); this.stopTranscription(); } } async togglePause() { if (!this.recorder) return; this.isPaused = !this.isPaused; if (this.isPaused) { this.recorder.pause(); this.pauseButton.textContent = "Resume"; this.updateStatus("Paused"); } else { this.recorder.resume(); this.pauseButton.textContent = "Pause"; this.updateStatus("Recording"); } } async saveTranscript() { try { const wavBlob = new Blob([this.encodeWav(new Float32Array(this.fullAudioData), 16000)], { type: 'audio/wav' }); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('file', wavBlob, filename); formData.append('text', this.fullTranscript.trim()); const response = await fetch('/api/log/audio', { method: 'POST', body: formData }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to save transcript and audio'); } const result = await response.json(); this.clearTranscript(); this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus(`Saved: ${result.file_name} - Transcript cleared`); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving:", error); this.updateStatus("Error saving transcript and audio"); } } clearTranscript() { this.fullTranscript = ""; this.audioData = []; this.fullAudioData = []; this.transcriptionDiv.innerText = "Waiting for transcription..."; this.updateButtonStates(this.recorder?.state === "recording"); } async stopTranscription() { try { console.log("Stopping transcription, audioContext state:", this.audioContext?.state); if (this.socket && this.socket.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN) { this.socket.close(1000, "Manual stop by client"); } if (this.audioContext && this.audioContext.state !== 'closed') { await this.audioContext.close(); } if (this.stream) { this.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.stream = null; } this.socket = null; this.updateButtonStates(false); this.updateStatus("Transcription stopped"); } catch (error) { console.error("Stop error:", error); this.updateStatus(`Stop error: ${error.message}`); } } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.pauseButton.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveButton.disabled = !this.fullTranscript; this.clearButton.disabled = !this.fullTranscript; this.startButton.textContent = isRecording ? "Stop Transcription" : "Start Transcription"; } updateStatus(message) { this.statusDiv.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } } // Expose transcriptionHandler to global scope for delete button onclick window.transcriptionHandler = new TranscriptionHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const transcriptionHandler = window.transcriptionHandler; transcriptionHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener('click', () => transcriptionHandler.confirmDelete()); transcriptionHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener('click', () => transcriptionHandler.cancelDelete()); });

Changes

  • Show Logs:
    • Added a <td> with a delete-button for each log, calling showDeleteConfirmation(log.id) on click.
  • Delete Functionality:
    • Added showDeleteConfirmation(logId) to display the modal and store the logId.
    • Added confirmDelete() to send a DELETE request to /api/logs/delete/{id} and refresh the logs.
    • Added cancelDelete() to hide the modal.
  • Global Scope: Exposed transcriptionHandler to the window object for the delete button’s onclick to work.
  • Event Listeners: Added listeners for the modal buttons after DOM load.

Step 3: Add Backend Endpoint (Placeholder)

We need a new endpoint in backend/api/routes/log.py to handle log deletion. Since this involves database operations, we’ll use SQLAlchemy to delete the log and its associated audio file.

backend/api/routes/log.py (add this function):

python
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import AsyncSession from backend.database import get_db from backend.models.log import Log import os import shutil from backend.config import settings # Assuming you have a settings.py with audio_logs_path router = APIRouter() # ... (existing routes like get_logs, upload_audio, get_audio) @router.delete('/logs/delete/{log_id}') async def delete_log(log_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)): try: # Find the log log = await db.get(Log, log_id) if not log: raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Log not found") # Delete the associated audio file audio_logs_path = os.path.join(settings.PROJECT_ROOT, "audio_logs") file_path = os.path.join(audio_logs_path, log.audio_file) if os.path.exists(file_path): os.remove(file_path) # Delete the log from the database await db.delete(log) await db.commit() return {"message": "Log deleted successfully"} except Exception as e: await db.rollback() raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail=f"Error deleting log: {e}")

Notes

  • Settings: You may need to create a backend/config.py with:
    python
    import os PROJECT_ROOT = os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)))
    Adjust the path logic if your project structure differs.
  • File Deletion: Ensures the audio file is removed from the filesystem.
  • Error Handling: Rolls back the database transaction if an error occurs.

Testing

  1. Update Files:
    • Save the updated live_transcription.html and live_transcription.js in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
    • Add the delete_log function to backend/api/routes/log.py.
    • Create backend/config.py if needed.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test Deletion:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/live-transcription.
    • Click "Show Logs" to load the table.
    • Click a "Delete" button next to a log; the modal should appear.
    • Click "Yes" to delete (confirms with the backend) or "No" to cancel.
    • Verify the log is removed from the table and the audio file is deleted from audio_logs.
  4. Debug:
    • 404/500 Errors: Check server logs for issues with the DELETE endpoint (e.g., database connection, file path).
    • Modal Issues: Ensure the modal displays and hides correctly. If not, verify display: flex and event listeners.
    • File Not Deleted: Confirm the audio_logs_path matches your project structure.

Additional Notes

  • Security: The endpoint assumes the user is authorized. For production, add authentication (e.g., JWT) to restrict deletions.
  • Styling: The red modal matches the sci-fi theme but uses a darker gradient for contrast. Adjust colors if needed.
  • Performance: The existing optimizations should handle the modal well, but monitor for lag with many logs.

Let me know if the delete functionality works or if you need further tweaks! Once confirmed, we can move to /context-audio-recording.

i got the action column but it doesn't have any button for delete the log

I apologize for the oversight! The issue likely stems from the fact that the showLogs method in live_transcription.js isn’t correctly rendering the delete button due to a potential mismatch in the HTML structure or JavaScript logic. Let’s debug and fix this by ensuring the "Delete" button is properly added to the Action column in the logs table. The problem might be related to how the row is constructed or how the onclick event is attached.

Debugging the Issue

  1. HTML Structure:
    • The updated live_transcription.html includes a <th>Action</th> and a <td> with a delete-button in the table row template. This part looks correct.
  2. JavaScript Logic:
    • In showLogs, the row is created with an innerHTML string that includes the delete button. However, the transcriptionHandler.showDeleteConfirmation(${log.id}) call might not work as expected if transcriptionHandler isn’t properly scoped or if there’s a typo in the inline event handler.
  3. Global Scope:
    • The window.transcriptionHandler assignment should make the handler accessible, but the inline onclick might fail if the DOM content isn’t fully loaded when the button is clicked.

Let’s verify and fix the JavaScript to ensure the delete button appears and functions correctly.

Updated live_transcription.js

We’ll adjust the showLogs method to dynamically create the delete button with an event listener instead of relying on inline onclick, which should resolve the scoping issue. This approach also ensures the button is properly attached after the DOM is ready.

frontend/live_transcription.js (updated):

javascript
class TranscriptionHandler { constructor() { this.startButton = document.getElementById("startButton"); this.pauseButton = document.getElementById("pauseButton"); this.saveButton = document.getElementById("saveButton"); this.clearButton = document.getElementById("clearButton"); this.transcriptionDiv = document.getElementById("transcription"); this.statusDiv = document.getElementById("status"); this.logsTableContainer = document.getElementById("logsTableContainer"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.showLogsButton = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.socket = null; this.recorder = null; this.stream = null; this.audioContext = null; this.audioData = []; this.fullAudioData = []; this.isPaused = false; this.fullTranscript = ""; this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); this.logIdToDelete = null; this.startButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.toggleTranscription()); this.pauseButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.togglePause()); this.saveButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveTranscript()); this.clearButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearTranscript()); this.showLogsButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Ready"); this.updateButtonStates(false); } async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const limit = 10; const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/data?limit=${limit}`, { method: 'GET' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch logs'); } const logs = await response.json(); console.log("Fetched logs:", logs); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const filename = log.audio_file; const audioUrl = `/api/audio/${filename}`; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.text}</td> <td><audio controls src="${audioUrl}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement('button'); deleteButton.className = 'delete-button'; deleteButton.textContent = 'Delete'; deleteButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); // Append to the Action column this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; this.deleteModal.style.display = 'flex'; } async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: 'DELETE' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to delete log'); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.showLogs(); // Refresh the logs table } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.logIdToDelete = null; } // ... (rest of the methods remain unchanged: toggleTranscription, startTranscription, etc.) updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.pauseButton.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveButton.disabled = !this.fullTranscript; this.clearButton.disabled = !this.fullTranscript; this.startButton.textContent = isRecording ? "Stop Transcription" : "Start Transcription"; } updateStatus(message) { this.statusDiv.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } } // Expose transcriptionHandler to global scope (though not needed with event listeners) window.transcriptionHandler = new TranscriptionHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const transcriptionHandler = window.transcriptionHandler; transcriptionHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener('click', () => transcriptionHandler.confirmDelete()); transcriptionHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener('click', () => transcriptionHandler.cancelDelete()); });

Changes

  • Dynamic Button Creation:
    • Replaced the inline onclick with a dynamically created deleteButton using document.createElement.
    • Added an event listener deleteButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)) to ensure proper scoping.
    • Appended the button to the fifth <td> (index 4) of the row, which corresponds to the "Action" column.
  • Removed Inline onclick: The previous inline onclick="transcriptionHandler.showDeleteConfirmation(${log.id})" is replaced to avoid potential scoping issues with the global window.transcriptionHandler.

Verification

The live_transcription.html file you provided already has the correct table structure with the <th>Action</th> and the modal setup, so no changes are needed there. The issue was in the JavaScript rendering logic.

Testing

  1. Update Files:
    • Replace live_transcription.js with the updated version in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test the Delete Button:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/live-transcription.
    • Click "Show Logs" to load the table.
    • Verify that each row now has a "Delete" button in the "Action" column.
    • Click the "Delete" button; the confirmation modal should appear.
    • Click "Yes" to delete (confirms with the backend) or "No" to cancel.
    • Check that the log is removed from the table and the audio file is deleted.
  4. Debug:
    • No Button Appears: Open the browser console (F12) and check for JavaScript errors. Ensure the logs array has data and the loop executes. Add console.log(log) inside the forEach to debug.
    • Modal Not Showing: Verify this.deleteModal.style.display = 'flex' works. If not, check the modal’s ID and CSS.
    • Delete Fails: Ensure the /api/logs/delete/{id} endpoint is correctly implemented in log.py and the audio_logs_path is valid.

Additional Notes

  • Backend Dependency: The delete functionality relies on the /api/logs/delete/{id} endpoint from the previous step. If it’s not working, double-check log.py and config.py.
  • Styling: The delete button matches the sci-fi theme with a red gradient. Adjust padding or font size in .delete-button if it looks off.
  • Performance: The existing optimizations should handle the additional button, but monitor for lag with many logs.

Let me know if the delete buttons appear now or if you encounter any other issues! Once this is resolved, we can proceed with the /context-audio-recording endpoint.

ok everything is good now I want to make the the front of root and live-transcription a litterbit darker maybe add some sci fi object to the background

I’m glad everything is working now! Let’s enhance the index.html and live_transcription.html frontends by making the background a bit darker to deepen the sci-fi atmosphere, and add some subtle sci-fi objects (e.g., floating geometric shapes or a distant planet) to the background. We’ll adjust the gradient to use darker base colors while keeping the neon accents, and use CSS to create simple animated objects for a futuristic effect.

Updated index.html with Darker Theme and Sci-Fi Objects

frontend/index.html (updated):

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Personal AI Logger</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); /* Darker base colors */ background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 15s ease infinite; position: relative; /* For sci-fi objects */ overflow: hidden; /* Prevent scrollbars from objects */ } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* Optimized particle effect */ body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 20s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px); } } /* Sci-fi objects (e.g., floating shapes and planet) */ .sci-fi-object { position: absolute; background: rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.2); border-radius: 50%; animation: orbit 20s infinite linear; z-index: -1; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5); } .object1 { width: 50px; height: 50px; top: 10%; left: 10%; animation-delay: 0s; } .object2 { width: 30px; height: 30px; top: 70%; left: 80%; animation-delay: 5s; } .planet { width: 120px; height: 120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #1a2a5a 0%, #00a3cc 70%, transparent 100%); top: 20%; left: 70%; animation: rotate 30s infinite linear; z-index: -1; } @keyframes orbit { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 50% { transform: translate(30px, 30px); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); } } @keyframes rotate { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } h1 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00a3cc, 0 0 12px #00d9a9, 0 0 18px #1a2a5a; } } .button-container { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 2rem; justify-content: center; } button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #0f1a4d, #00a3cc); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.3rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.3), inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.2); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; z-index: 0; } button:hover::before { width: 150px; height: 150px; } button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.4), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.3); } button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 2rem; } button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.9rem 2rem; } .sci-fi-object { display: none; /* Hide objects on small screens to reduce lag */ } .planet { display: none; } } </style> </head> <body> <div class="sci-fi-object object1"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object object2"></div> <div class="planet"></div> <h1>Personal AI Logger</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button onclick="window.location.href='/live-transcription'">Live Transcription</button> <button onclick="window.location.href='/context-audio-recording'">Context Audio Recording</button> </div> </body> </html>

Changes

  • Darker Gradient:
    • Updated the gradient to #050818 (darker black), #0f1a4d (deep navy), #1a2a5a (dark metallic blue), #00a3cc (muted cyan), and #00d9a9 (softer teal) for a deeper sci-fi feel.
  • Sci-Fi Objects:
    • Added .sci-fi-object class with two small circles (object1 and object2) that orbit using the orbit animation.
    • Added a .planet div with a radial gradient to simulate a distant planet, rotating with the rotate animation.
    • Positioned objects absolutely with different delays and locations for a layered effect.
  • Performance:
    • Kept existing optimizations (e.g., background-size: 150%, slow animations).
    • Hid objects on mobile devices (@media (max-width: 480px)) to reduce lag.

Updated live_transcription.html with Darker Theme and Sci-Fi Objects

frontend/live_transcription.html (updated):

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Real-Time Transcription</title> <style> /* Import Orbitron font from Google Fonts (optional) */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); /* Darker base colors */ background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 15s ease infinite; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 20s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px); } } /* Sci-fi objects */ .sci-fi-object { position: absolute; background: rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.2); border-radius: 50%; animation: orbit 20s infinite linear; z-index: -1; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5); } .object1 { width: 50px; height: 50px; top: 15%; left: 15%; animation-delay: 0s; } .object2 { width: 30px; height: 30px; top: 75%; left: 85%; animation-delay: 5s; } .planet { width: 120px; height: 120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #1a2a5a 0%, #00a3cc 70%, transparent 100%); top: 25%; left: 75%; animation: rotate 30s infinite linear; z-index: -1; } @keyframes orbit { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 50% { transform: translate(30px, 30px); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); } } @keyframes rotate { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00a3cc, 0 0 12px #00d9a9, 0 0 18px #1a2a5a; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #0f1a4d, #00a3cc); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.4), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.3); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .control-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; z-index: 0; } .control-button:hover::before { width: 200px; height: 200px; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5), inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.4); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } .control-button.pause { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); } .control-button.save { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1b5e20, #4caf50); } .control-button.clear { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #424242, #757575); } #transcription { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00a3cc; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); /* Darker background */ min-height: 15vh; width: 85%; display: inline-block; box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.3), inset 0 0 8px rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.2); } #debugOutput { margin-top: 2vh; padding: 1.5vw; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); /* Darker background */ border: 0.1rem solid #00a3cc; font-family: monospace; max-height: 20vh; overflow-y: auto; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.3); } .status-indicator { font-size: 1rem; margin-top: 1vh; color: #00d9a9; text-shadow: 0 0 4px #00d9a9; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; overflow-y: auto; max-height: 40vh; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9), rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9)); /* Darker gradient */ border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00a3cc, #1a2a5a); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00d9a9; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #1a2a5a; color: #d0d0d0; /* Slightly lighter for contrast */ font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); /* Darker background */ border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: inset 0 0 4px #00a3cc; } .delete-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4), inset 0 0 5px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.3); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .delete-button::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 0; height: 0; background: rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.15); border-radius: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s; z-index: 0; } .delete-button:hover::before { width: 150px; height: 150px; } .delete-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 5px 12px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.5), inset 0 0 7px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .delete-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); /* Darker modal background */ z-index: 1000; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .modal-content { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9), rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9)); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.5); text-align: center; width: 90%; max-width: 400px; color: #cc0000; text-shadow: 0 0 5px #cc0000; animation: fadeIn 0.3s; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .modal-content h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .modal-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.3s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .modal-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 5px 12px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.5); } .modal-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal-button.cancel { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #424242, #757575); } @media (max-width: 768px) { #transcription { width: 95%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2vw; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem; } .sci-fi-object { display: none; /* Hide on tablets to reduce lag */ } .planet { display: none; } } @media (max-width: 480px) { h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; } #transcription { width: 100%; font-size: 1rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } .status-indicator { font-size: 0.9rem; } #debugOutput { font-size: 0.8rem; max-height: 15vh; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.7rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <div class="sci-fi-object object1"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object object2"></div> <div class="planet"></div> <h1>Real-Time Transcription</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="startButton" class="control-button">Start Transcription</button> <button id="pauseButton" class="control-button pause" disabled>Pause</button> <button id="saveButton" class="control-button save" disabled>Save Transcript</button> <button id="clearButton" class="control-button clear" disabled>Clear</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="transcription">Waiting for transcription...</div> <div id="status" class="status-indicator"></div> <div id="debugOutput"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Transcription Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Text</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> <th>Action</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <div id="deleteModal" class="modal"> <div class="modal-content"> <h2>Confirm Deletion</h2> <p>Are you sure you want to delete this log?</p> <div class="modal-buttons"> <button id="confirmDelete" class="modal-button">Yes</button> <button id="cancelDelete" class="modal-button cancel">No</button> </div> </div> </div> <script src="/static/live_transcription.js"></script> </body> </html>

Changes

  • Darker Gradient:
    • Updated to #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, and #00d9a9 for a darker base, maintaining neon highlights.
  • Sci-Fi Objects:
    • Added the same .sci-fi-object and .planet elements as in index.html, with adjusted positions for variety.
  • Darker Elements:
    • Adjusted #transcription, #debugOutput, audio, and table backgrounds to rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9) for consistency.
    • Updated button gradients and modal background to darker tones while keeping the sci-fi style.

Testing

  1. Replace Files:
    • Save the updated index.html and live_transcription.html in C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger\frontend.
  2. Restart Server:
    • Run uvicorn from the project root:
      bash
      cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --reload
  3. Test the Updates:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/ and http://127.0.0.1:8000/live-transcription.
    • Verify the darker gradient and sci-fi objects (circles and planet) animate smoothly.
    • Check that all interactive elements (buttons, logs table, delete modal) work as before.
    • Monitor performance with the browser’s Performance tab (F12) to ensure no lag.
  4. Debug:
    • Lag: If objects cause lag, reduce their size (e.g., width: 40px) or hide them on smaller screens earlier (e.g., @media (max-width: 768px)).
    • Objects Not Visible: Ensure position: absolute and z-index: -1 are correct. Adjust top and left values if they’re off-screen.
    • Styling Issues: Check the console for CSS errors.

Additional Notes
