if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to delete log"); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; this.showLogs(); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; this.logIdToDelete = null; } } // Instantiate the handler window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); });

Fixes and Changes

  1. Fixed generateSentence:
    • Replaced this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[1] with this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)] to randomly select a sentence.
    • Added a check for an empty corpus (if (this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0)) to prevent the error if the corpus is somehow undefined or empty.
  2. Aligned saveRecording:
    • Changed the endpoint from /api/logs/audio to /context-audio-recording/save to match the backend.
    • Replaced formData.append("text", this.currentSentence) with formData.append("sentence", this.currentSentence) and added formData.append("timestamp", new Date().toISOString()) to match the expected fields in main.py.
  3. Aligned showLogs:
    • Changed the endpoint from /api/logs/data?limit=10 to /context-audio-recording/logs to match the backend.
    • Adjusted the log data structure to use log.sentence instead of log.text, with a fallback to "N/A".
    • Updated the audio URL to /audio/${log.filename} to match the mounted directory.
  4. Aligned confirmDelete:
    • Changed the endpoint from /api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete} to /context-audio-recording/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}.
  5. Error Prevention:
    • Ensured all methods include proper error handling to log and display issues.

Step 2: Verify Backend Compatibility

The updated frontend now aligns with the endpoints in main.py. Ensure your main.py includes the /context-audio-recording/save, /context-audio-recording/logs, and /context-audio-recording/delete/{log_id} endpoints as shown in the previous version. The SENTENCE_CORPUS in the frontend is now used locally, so you can remove the /context-audio-recording/generate-sentence endpoint from main.py if you prefer to keep generation client-side (though it’s currently active in the backend version I provided).

If you want to revert to using the backend’s generate-sentence endpoint (with its own corpus), let me know, and I can adjust the JS to fetch from it again.

Step 3: Test the Changes

  1. Save the Updated JS File:
    • Replace frontend/audio_context_record.js with the updated version.
  2. Run the Server:
    bash
    cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload --log-level debug
  3. Test Sentence Generation:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/context-audio-recording (you’ll need audio_context_record.html to test fully, which we’ll create next).
    • Click the "Generate Sentence" button and verify that a random sentence from the corpus appears (e.g., "The spaceship hovered silently above the alien planet").
    • Check the console for errors and the status message for updates.
  4. Test Recording and Saving:
    • Record audio, save it, and verify the log table updates.
    • Ensure no errors occur during the save process.

Next Steps

  1. Create audio_context_record.html: We need the HTML file with all DOM elements (including clearSentence button).
  2. Test the Full Flow: Ensure sentence generation, recording, saving, clearing, and log management work together.

Would you like to proceed with creating audio_context_record.html, or do you need further adjustments to the JS? Also, if you can share backend.api.routes.log (your log.py), I can confirm the method signatures for add_log, get_logs, and delete_log to ensure full compatibility.

generateSentence() { try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); if (this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) { throw new Error("No sentences available in the corpus"); } this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)]; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } Error generating sentence: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length') Recording Logs

The error Error generating sentence: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length') indicates that this.SENTENCE_CORPUS is undefined when the generateSentence method is called. This happens because the SENTENCE_CORPUS array is defined inside the constructor, but there might be an issue with how the class is instantiated or how the DOM elements are loaded, causing the method to execute before SENTENCE_CORPUS is properly initialized. Additionally, the error could occur if the file is reloaded or the class instance is recreated without the constructor running correctly.

Let’s troubleshoot and fix this:

  1. Verify Initialization: Ensure SENTENCE_CORPUS is defined as a class property (not just a local variable in the constructor) to avoid scope issues.
  2. Check DOM Loading: The error might occur if generateSentence is called before the DOM is fully loaded or if the class instance is not properly set up.
  3. Debugging: Add a check to log the state of this.SENTENCE_CORPUS to confirm its value.

Here’s the corrected and debug-enhanced version of the generateSentence method within the full RecordingHandler class. I’ll also ensure the class structure prevents this issue.

Updated frontend/audio_context_record.js

javascript
class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Define SENTENCE_CORPUS as a class property this.SENTENCE_CORPUS = [ "The spaceship hovered silently above the alien planet.", "A mysterious signal came from the edge of the galaxy.", "The robot repaired the damaged starship in record time.", "Green lights flickered in the distant nebula.", "The captain ordered a course change to avoid the asteroid field.", "A lone astronaut drifted through the void of space.", "The AI system detected an anomaly in the star charts.", "Purple storms raged on the surface of the gas giant.", "The crew discovered ancient ruins on the moon's surface.", "A black hole loomed ominously at the galaxy's core.", "The interstellar probe sent back images of a frozen world.", "A comet streaked across the sky, leaving a trail of ice.", "The station orbited a planet with rings of shimmering dust.", "An alien artifact emitted a strange, pulsating glow.", "The engineer calibrated the warp drive for a long journey.", "A supernova illuminated the night sky with brilliant light.", "The colonists built a dome to survive the harsh atmosphere.", "A fleet of drones scanned the asteroid belt for resources.", "The scientist analyzed data from a distant exoplanet.", "The space elevator connected the planet to its orbiting station." ]; // Bind event listeners if (this.generateSentenceBtn) { this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); } else { console.error("generateSentenceBtn not found in DOM"); } this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; } // Generate a random sentence from the corpus generateSentence() { console.log("SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS); // Debug log try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); if (!this.SENTENCE_CORPUS || this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) { throw new Error("No sentences available in the corpus"); } this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)]; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ audio: true }); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("sentence", this.currentSentence); formData.append("timestamp", new Date().toISOString()); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/save", { method: "POST", body: formData, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const data = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Recording saved successfully: ID ${data.id}`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/logs", { method: "GET", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to fetch logs"); } const logs = await response.json(); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ""; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.sentence || "N/A"}</td> <td><audio controls src="/audio/${log.filename}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement("button"); deleteButton.className = "delete-button"; deleteButton.textContent = "Delete"; deleteButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/context-audio-recording/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: "DELETE", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to delete log"); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; this.showLogs(); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; this.logIdToDelete = null; } } // Instantiate the handler window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); });

Fixes and Enhancements

  1. Moved SENTENCE_CORPUS to Class Property:
    • Defined this.SENTENCE_CORPUS directly on the instance in the constructor to ensure it’s available throughout the class lifecycle. This avoids scope issues if the constructor isn’t called properly.
  2. Added DOM Element Check:
    • Added a conditional check for this.generateSentenceBtn to log an error if the button isn’t found in the DOM. This helps diagnose if the HTML is missing or misconfigured.
  3. Added Debug Logging:
    • Added console.log("SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS) in generateSentence to verify the corpus is defined when the method runs.
  4. Improved Error Handling:
    • Updated the condition to if (!this.SENTENCE_CORPUS || this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) to handle cases where SENTENCE_CORPUS might be undefined or empty.

Troubleshooting the Error

The error suggests that this.SENTENCE_CORPUS is undefined when generateSentence is called. Possible causes and solutions:

  • DOM Load Issue: If the script runs before the DOM is fully loaded, the class instantiation might fail. Ensure the script is loaded after the HTML or use the DOMContentLoaded event correctly.
  • File Corruption: If the file was saved incorrectly or reloaded, the SENTENCE_CORPUS definition might be lost. Verify the file contents.
  • Class Re-Instantiation: If window.recordingHandler is overwritten or the constructor isn’t called, the state might be lost. The current code should prevent this, but we can add a safeguard.

To confirm, check the browser console for the SENTENCE_CORPUS log output when you click the "Generate Sentence" button. If it’s undefined, the issue is with the class instantiation or script loading.

Step 2: Test the Changes

  1. Save the Updated JS File:
    • Replace frontend/audio_context_record.js with the updated version.
  2. Run the Server:
    bash
    cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload --log-level debug
  3. Test Sentence Generation:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/context-audio-recording (you’ll need audio_context_record.html to test fully).
    • Open the browser console (F12).
    • Click the "Generate Sentence" button and check:
      • The console log for SENTENCE_CORPUS (should show the array).
      • The status message (should say "Sentence generated. Ready to record.").
      • The sentenceDiv (should display a random sentence).
    • If you still get the error, note the console output and any additional logs.
  4. Temporary HTML (if Needed):
    • If audio_context_record.html isn’t ready, create a minimal version to test:
      html
      <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <body> <button id="generateSentence">Generate Sentence</button> <div id="sentence"></div> <div id="recordingStatus"></div> <script src="/static/audio_context_record.js"></script> </body> </html>
    • Save this as frontend/audio_context_record.html and test.

  • Share the console output when you click "Generate Sentence".

Would you like to proceed with creating audio_context_record.html to include all buttons and elements, or do you need further debugging help? Also, sharing backend.api.routes.log (your log.py) would help verify the backend methods.

here is the js class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Bind event listeners this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); this.SENTENCE_CORPUS = [ "The spaceship hovered silently above the alien planet.", "A mysterious signal came from the edge of the galaxy.", "The robot repaired the damaged starship in record time.", "Green lights flickered in the distant nebula.", "The captain ordered a course change to avoid the asteroid field.", "A lone astronaut drifted through the void of space.", "The AI system detected an anomaly in the star charts.", "Purple storms raged on the surface of the gas giant.", "The crew discovered ancient ruins on the moon's surface.", "A black hole loomed ominously at the galaxy's core.", "The interstellar probe sent back images of a frozen world.", "A comet streaked across the sky, leaving a trail of ice.", "The station orbited a planet with rings of shimmering dust.", "An alien artifact emitted a strange, pulsating glow.", "The engineer calibrated the warp drive for a long journey.", "A supernova illuminated the night sky with brilliant light.", "The colonists built a dome to survive the harsh atmosphere.", "A fleet of drones scanned the asteroid belt for resources.", "The scientist analyzed data from a distant exoplanet.", "The space elevator connected the planet to its orbiting station." ]; } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; // Disable if no sentence to clear } // Generate a sentence by fetching from the backend generateSentence() { try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); if (this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) { throw new Error("No sentences available in the corpus"); } this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)]; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ audio: true }); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); // Create unique filename with timestamp const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); // this frontend filename is just a recommended name, and isn't required for the backend to save the file const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("text", this.currentSentence); const response = await fetch('/api/logs/audio', { method: 'POST', body: formData }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const result = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Saved: ${result.file_name} - Transcript cleared`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const limit = 10; const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/data?limit=${limit}`, { method: 'GET' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch logs'); } const logs = await response.json(); console.log("Fetched logs:", logs); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const filename = log.audio_file; const audioUrl = `/api/audio/${filename}`; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.text}</td> <td><audio controls src="${audioUrl}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement('button'); deleteButton.className = 'delete-button'; deleteButton.textContent = 'Delete'; deleteButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); // Append to the Action column this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: 'DELETE' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to delete log'); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.showLogs(); // Refresh the logs table } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.logIdToDelete = null; } } // Instantiate the handler window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); }); here the html script <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Context Audio Recording</title> <style> @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); } .modal-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .modal-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .modal-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal-button.cancel { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #424242, #757575); } @media (max-width: 768px) { #sentence { width: 95%; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem; } .sci-fi-object { display: none; /* Hide on mobile to reduce lag */ } } @media (max-width: 480px) { body { padding-top: 2rem; } h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin: 1rem 1rem 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } #sentence { width: 100%;
