} .delete-button { font-size: 0.7rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <div class="sci-fi-object planet1"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object planet2"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object spaceship"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object alien"></div> <h1>Context Audio Recording</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="generateSentence" class="control-button">Generate Sentence</button> <button id="startRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Start Recording</button> <button id="stopRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Stop Recording</button> <button id="saveRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Save Recording</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="sentence">Click "Generate Sentence" to start.</div> <div id="recordingStatus"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Recording Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Sentence</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> <th>Action</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <div id="deleteModal" class="modal"> <div class="modal-content"> <h2>Confirm Deletion</h2> <p>Are you sure you want to delete this recording?</p> <div class="modal-buttons"> <button id="confirmDelete" class="modal-button">Yes</button> <button id="cancelDelete" class="modal-button cancel">No</button> </div> </div> </div> <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script> </body> </html>
2 / 2

Thank you for providing both the updated context_audio_recording.js and the corresponding audio_context_record.html (with a script source mismatch—I'll address that). The error Error generating sentence: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length') persists because, despite SENTENCE_CORPUS being defined in the constructor, there might be an issue with the class instantiation or script loading order. However, reviewing the code and HTML, the primary issue seems to be a mismatch between the script filename in the HTML (context_audio_recording.js) and the expected audio_context_record.js in previous discussions, which could lead to the wrong file being loaded or the class not being initialized properly.

Identified Issues

  1. Script Filename Mismatch:
    • The HTML references <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script>, but the file you provided is named context_audio_recording.js, while earlier discussions used audio_context_record.js. This mismatch could cause the browser to load an incorrect or non-existent file, leading to SENTENCE_CORPUS being undefined.
    • Solution: Ensure the script filename matches the actual file name in the frontend/ directory.
  2. DOM Element Availability:
    • The constructor assumes all DOM elements (e.g., generateSentenceBtn) are available when new RecordingHandler() is called. If the script runs before the HTML is fully parsed, document.getElementById might return null, causing issues later.
    • Solution: Move the class instantiation inside the DOMContentLoaded event to ensure the DOM is ready.
  3. Endpoint Mismatch:
    • The saveRecording method uses /api/logs/audio and text, while the backend expects /context-audio-recording/save with sentence and timestamp. This will cause a 400 or 500 error when saving.
    • The showLogs method uses /api/logs/data?limit=10, but the backend provides /context-audio-recording/logs.
    • Solution: Align the endpoints and form data with the backend.
  4. Potential SENTENCE_CORPUS Scope Issue:
    • Although SENTENCE_CORPUS is defined in the constructor, if the constructor isn’t called (e.g., due to a script load error), this.SENTENCE_CORPUS will be undefined.
    • Solution: Add a debug log in the constructor and ensure the class is instantiated correctly.

Updated frontend/context_audio_recording.js

I’ll rename the file to match the HTML and fix the issues:

javascript
class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements with null checks this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Validate DOM elements if (!this.generateSentenceBtn || !this.startRecordingBtn || !this.stopRecordingBtn || !this.saveRecordingBtn || !this.clearSentenceBtn || !this.showLogsBtn || !this.sentenceDiv || !this.recordingStatus || !this.logsTableBody || !this.deleteModal || !this.confirmDeleteBtn || !this.cancelDeleteBtn) { console.error("One or more DOM elements not found:", { generateSentenceBtn: this.generateSentenceBtn, startRecordingBtn: this.startRecordingBtn, stopRecordingBtn: this.stopRecordingBtn, saveRecordingBtn: this.saveRecordingBtn, clearSentenceBtn: this.clearSentenceBtn, showLogsBtn: this.showLogsBtn, sentenceDiv: this.sentenceDiv, recordingStatus: this.recordingStatus, logsTableBody: this.logsTableBody, deleteModal: this.deleteModal, confirmDeleteBtn: this.confirmDeleteBtn, cancelDeleteBtn: this.cancelDeleteBtn }); throw new Error("Required DOM elements are missing"); } // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Define SENTENCE_CORPUS as a class property this.SENTENCE_CORPUS = [ "The spaceship hovered silently above the alien planet.", "A mysterious signal came from the edge of the galaxy.", "The robot repaired the damaged starship in record time.", "Green lights flickered in the distant nebula.", "The captain ordered a course change to avoid the asteroid field.", "A lone astronaut drifted through the void of space.", "The AI system detected an anomaly in the star charts.", "Purple storms raged on the surface of the gas giant.", "The crew discovered ancient ruins on the moon's surface.", "A black hole loomed ominously at the galaxy's core.", "The interstellar probe sent back images of a frozen world.", "A comet streaked across the sky, leaving a trail of ice.", "The station orbited a planet with rings of shimmering dust.", "An alien artifact emitted a strange, pulsating glow.", "The engineer calibrated the warp drive for a long journey.", "A supernova illuminated the night sky with brilliant light.", "The colonists built a dome to survive the harsh atmosphere.", "A fleet of drones scanned the asteroid belt for resources.", "The scientist analyzed data from a distant exoplanet.", "The space elevator connected the planet to its orbiting station." ]; console.log("Constructor executed, SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS); // Debug log // Bind event listeners this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { if (this.recordingStatus) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } else { console.error("recordingStatus element not found"); } } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; } // Generate a random sentence from the corpus generateSentence() { console.log("generateSentence called, SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS); // Debug log try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); if (!this.SENTENCE_CORPUS || this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) { throw new Error("No sentences available in the corpus"); } this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)]; if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ audio: true }); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("sentence", this.currentSentence); // Changed from 'text' to 'sentence' formData.append("timestamp", new Date().toISOString()); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/save", { // Changed from '/api/logs/audio' method: "POST", body: formData, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const data = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Recording saved successfully: ID ${data.id}`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/logs", { // Changed from '/api/logs/data' method: "GET", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to fetch logs"); } const logs = await response.json(); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ""; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.sentence || "N/A"}</td> <td><audio controls src="/audio/${log.filename}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement("button"); deleteButton.className = "delete-button"; deleteButton.textContent = "Delete"; deleteButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } } else { console.error("logsTableBody element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } else { console.error("deleteModal element not found"); } } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/context-audio-recording/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { // Changed from '/api/logs/delete' method: "DELETE", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to delete log"); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; } this.showLogs(); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; } this.logIdToDelete = null; } } // Instantiate the handler inside DOMContentLoaded document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { try { window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); } catch (error) { console.error("Error initializing RecordingHandler:", error); } });

Updated frontend/audio_context_record.html

The HTML filename should match the script reference. Since the JS is now context_audio_recording.js, update the HTML script tag accordingly. However, to maintain consistency with previous discussions, I’ll assume you intended audio_context_record.html and adjust the script path. Here’s the corrected HTML:

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Context Audio Recording</title> <style> @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 20s ease infinite; position: relative; overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y: auto; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.03) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 25s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .sci-fi-object { position: absolute; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .planet1 { width: 120px; height: 120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #1a2a5a 0%, #00a3cc 70%, transparent 100%); top: 25%; left: 75%; animation: rotate 30s infinite linear; } .planet2 { width: 80px; height: 80px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #2a4494 0%, #00d9a9 70%, transparent 100%); top: 65%; left: 20%; animation: rotate 40s infinite linear reverse; } .planet2::before { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 100px; height: 20px; background: rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.2); top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(30deg); border-radius: 50%; } .spaceship { width: 0; height: 0; border-left: 20px solid transparent; border-right: 20px solid transparent; border-bottom: 40px solid rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5); top: 45%; left: 80%; animation: fly 15s infinite ease-in-out; } .alien { width: 60px; height: 80px; background: radial-gradient(ellipse at center, rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.3) 0%, transparent 70%); top: 75%; left: 55%; border-radius: 50% 50% 30% 30%; animation: hover 10s infinite ease-in-out; } .alien::before { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 10px; height: 10px; background: #00d9a9; top: 20%; left: 25%; border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d9a9, 20px 0 0 #00d9a9, 20px 0 8px #00d9a9; } @keyframes rotate { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes fly { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(45deg); } 50% { transform: translate(-300px, 50px) rotate(45deg); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(45deg); } } @keyframes hover { 0% { transform: translateY(0
Interrupted
THE FILE name was right

Thank you for confirming that the filename context_audio_recording.js is correct and matches the HTML's <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script>. The persistent error Error generating sentence: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length') suggests that the issue lies elsewhere, likely related to the script loading order, class instantiation, or an unexpected overwrite of the RecordingHandler instance. Since the HTML and JS filenames align, let’s focus on debugging and fixing the root cause.

Analysis of the Issue

The error occurs because this.SENTENCE_CORPUS is undefined when generateSentence is called, despite being defined in the constructor. Possible reasons:

  1. Script Loading Order: The <script> tag is in the <body> at the bottom of the HTML, which should ensure the DOM is loaded, but if the browser caches an older version or the file fails to load, the class might not initialize properly.
  2. Class Instantiation: The window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler() might be overwritten or not executed if there’s a syntax error or runtime exception in the script.
  3. Constructor Execution: If the constructor throws an uncaught exception (e.g., due to missing DOM elements), SENTENCE_CORPUS won’t be set, and subsequent method calls will fail.

Debugging Steps

  • Check Console Logs: The updated code includes debug logs (console.log) to track SENTENCE_CORPUS and DOM element availability. These will help identify where the failure occurs.
  • Verify File Load: Ensure the file /static/context_audio_recording.js is correctly served by the FastAPI server and matches the provided JS content.
  • Test DOM Readiness: Moving instantiation to DOMContentLoaded should mitigate DOM loading issues.

Updated frontend/context_audio_recording.js

I’ll enhance the code with additional safeguards and debug logging to pinpoint the issue:

javascript
class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements with null checks this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Validate DOM elements if (!this.generateSentenceBtn || !this.startRecordingBtn || !this.stopRecordingBtn || !this.saveRecordingBtn || !this.clearSentenceBtn || !this.showLogsBtn || !this.sentenceDiv || !this.recordingStatus || !this.logsTableBody || !this.deleteModal || !this.confirmDeleteBtn || !this.cancelDeleteBtn) { console.error("One or more DOM elements not found:", { generateSentenceBtn: this.generateSentenceBtn, startRecordingBtn: this.startRecordingBtn, stopRecordingBtn: this.stopRecordingBtn, saveRecordingBtn: this.saveRecordingBtn, clearSentenceBtn: this.clearSentenceBtn, showLogsBtn: this.showLogsBtn, sentenceDiv: this.sentenceDiv, recordingStatus: this.recordingStatus, logsTableBody: this.logsTableBody, deleteModal: this.deleteModal, confirmDeleteBtn: this.confirmDeleteBtn, cancelDeleteBtn: this.cancelDeleteBtn }); throw new Error("Required DOM elements are missing"); } // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Define SENTENCE_CORPUS as a class property this.SENTENCE_CORPUS = [ "The spaceship hovered silently above the alien planet.", "A mysterious signal came from the edge of the galaxy.", "The robot repaired the damaged starship in record time.", "Green lights flickered in the distant nebula.", "The captain ordered a course change to avoid the asteroid field.", "A lone astronaut drifted through the void of space.", "The AI system detected an anomaly in the star charts.", "Purple storms raged on the surface of the gas giant.", "The crew discovered ancient ruins on the moon's surface.", "A black hole loomed ominously at the galaxy's core.", "The interstellar probe sent back images of a frozen world.", "A comet streaked across the sky, leaving a trail of ice.", "The station orbited a planet with rings of shimmering dust.", "An alien artifact emitted a strange, pulsating glow.", "The engineer calibrated the warp drive for a long journey.", "A supernova illuminated the night sky with brilliant light.", "The colonists built a dome to survive the harsh atmosphere.", "A fleet of drones scanned the asteroid belt for resources.", "The scientist analyzed data from a distant exoplanet.", "The space elevator connected the planet to its orbiting station." ]; console.log("Constructor executed, SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS); // Debug log // Bind event listeners this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { if (this.recordingStatus) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } else { console.error("recordingStatus element not found"); } } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; } // Generate a random sentence from the corpus generateSentence() { console.log("generateSentence called, SENTENCE_CORPUS:", this.SENTENCE_CORPUS); // Debug log try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); if (!this.SENTENCE_CORPUS || this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length === 0) { throw new Error("No sentences available in the corpus"); } this.currentSentence = this.SENTENCE_CORPUS[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.SENTENCE_CORPUS.length)]; if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ audio: true }); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("sentence", this.currentSentence); // Changed from 'text' to 'sentence' formData.append("timestamp", new Date().toISOString()); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/save", { // Changed from '/api/logs/audio' method: "POST", body: formData, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const data = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Recording saved successfully: ID ${data.id}`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/logs", { // Changed from '/api/logs/data' method: "GET", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to fetch logs"); } const logs = await response.json(); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ""; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const row = document.createElement("tr"); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.sentence || "N/A"}</td> <td><audio controls src="/audio/${log.filename}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement("button"); deleteButton.className = "delete-button"; deleteButton.textContent = "Delete"; deleteButton.addEventListener("click", () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } } else { console.error("logsTableBody element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } else { console.error("deleteModal element not found"); } } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/context-audio-recording/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { // Changed from '/api/logs/delete' method: "DELETE", }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to delete log"); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; } this.showLogs(); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "none"; } this.logIdToDelete = null; } } // Ensure DOM is fully loaded before instantiating document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { try { console.log("DOM fully loaded, instantiating RecordingHandler..."); window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); } catch (error) { console.error("Error initializing RecordingHandler:", error); } });

Updated frontend/audio_context_record.html

The HTML is mostly correct, but I’ll ensure the script path matches the JS filename and complete the truncated hover animation:

html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Context Audio Recording</title> <style> @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 20s ease infinite; position: relative; overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y: auto; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.03) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 25s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .sci-fi-object { position: absolute; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .planet1 { width: 120px; height: 120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #1a2a5a 0%, #00a3cc 70%, transparent 100%); top: 25%; left: 75%; animation: rotate 30s infinite linear; } .planet2 { width: 80px; height: 80px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #2a4494 0%, #00d9a9 70%, transparent 100%); top: 65%; left: 20%; animation: rotate 40s infinite linear reverse; } .planet2::before { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 100px; height: 20px; background: rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.2); top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(30deg); border-radius: 50%; } .spaceship { width: 0; height: 0; border-left: 20px solid transparent; border-right: 20px solid transparent; border-bottom: 40px solid rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5); top: 45%; left: 80%; animation: fly 15s infinite ease-in-out; } .alien { width: 60px; height: 80px; background: radial-gradient(ellipse at center, rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.3) 0%, transparent 70%); top: 75%; left: 55%; border-radius: 50% 50% 30% 30%; animation: hover 10s infinite ease-in-out; } .alien::before { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 10px; height: 10px; background: #00d9a9; top: 20%; left: 25%; border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 0 8px #00d9a9, 20px 0 0 #00d9a9, 20px 0 8px #00d9a9; } @keyframes rotate { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes fly { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(45deg); } 50% { transform: translate(-300px, 50px) rotate(45deg); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(45deg); } } @keyframes hover { 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); } 100% { transform: translateY(0); } } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; text-align: center; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00a3cc, 0 0 12px #00d9a9, 0 0 18px #1a2a5a; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; padding-bottom: 1rem; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #0f1a4d, #00a3cc); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.4); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } #sentence { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00a3cc; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); width: 85%; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.3); } #recordingStatus { margin-top: 1vh; font-size: 1rem; color: #00d9a9; text-shadow: 0 0 4px #00d9a9; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; overflow-y: auto; max-height: 40vh; padding-bottom: 1rem; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9), rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9)); border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00a3cc, #1a2a5a); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00d9a9; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #1a2a5a; color: #d0d0d0; font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: inset 0 0 4px #00a3cc; } .delete-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .delete-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .delete-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); z-index: 1000; justify-content: center; align-items: center; overflow-y: auto; } .modal-content { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9), rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9)); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.5); text-align: center; width: 90%; max-width: 400px; color: #cc0000; text-shadow: 0 0 5px #cc0000; animation: fadeIn 0.3s; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .modal-content h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .modal-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .modal-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .modal-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal-button.cancel { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #424242, #757575); } @media (max-width: 768px) { #sentence { width: 95%; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem; } .sci-fi-object { display: none; /* Hide on mobile to reduce lag */ } } @media (max-width: 480px) { body { padding-top: 2rem; } h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin: 1rem 1rem 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } #sentence { width: 100%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } #recordingStatus { font-size: 0.9rem; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.7rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <div class="sci-fi-object planet1"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object planet2"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object spaceship"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object alien"></div> <h1>Context Audio Recording</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="generateSentence" class="control-button">Generate Sentence</button> <button id="startRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Start Recording</button> <button id="stopRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Stop Recording</button> <button id="saveRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Save Recording</button> <button id="clearSentence" class="control-button">Clear Sentence</button> <!-- Added missing button --> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="sentence">Click "Generate Sentence" to start.</div> <div id="recordingStatus"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Recording Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Sentence</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> <th>Action</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <div id="deleteModal" class="modal"> <div class="modal-content"> <h2>Confirm Deletion</h2> <p>Are you sure you want to delete this recording?</p> <div class="modal-buttons"> <button id="confirmDelete" class="modal-button">Yes</button> <button id="cancelDelete" class="modal-button cancel">No</button> </div> </div> </div> <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script> </body> </html>

Changes Made

  1. Fixed Script Filename:
    • Ensured the HTML uses <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script> to match the JS file name.
  2. Added Missing clearSentence Button:
    • The HTML was missing the <button id="clearSentence"> element, which caused the clearSentenceBtn to be null in the constructor. Added it to the button-container.
  3. Enhanced Debugging:
    • Added console.log in the constructor and generateSentence to track SENTENCE_CORPUS.
    • Added DOM element validation in the constructor to catch missing elements early.
  4. Aligned Endpoints:
    • Updated saveRecording to use /context-audio-recording/save with sentence and timestamp.
    • Updated showLogs to use /context-audio-recording/logs.
    • Updated confirmDelete to use /context-audio-recording/delete/{log_id}.
  5. Completed Animation:
    • Fixed the truncated @keyframes hover in the CSS.

Step 2: Test the Changes

  1. Save Files:
    • Save the updated context_audio_recording.js in frontend/.
    • Save the updated audio_context_record.html as frontend/audio_context_record.html (or adjust the FastAPI route in main.py to serve context_audio_recording.html if preferred).
  2. Run the Server:
    bash
    cd C:\CetLocal\1_Artificial intelligence\Projects\Personal-AI-Logger uvicorn backend.main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload --log-level debug
  3. Test Sentence Generation:
    • Open http://127.0.0.1:8000/context-audio-recording in the browser.
    • Open the console (F12).
    • Click the "Generate Sentence" button and check:
      • Console log for Constructor executed, SENTENCE_CORPUS: (should show the array).
      • Console log for generateSentence called, SENTENCE_CORPUS: (should show the array).
      • Status message (should say "Sentence generated. Ready to record.").
      • sentenceDiv (should display a random sentence).
    • If the error persists, note the console output (especially the SENTENCE_CORPUS logs).
  4. Test Other Functionality:
    • Test recording, saving, clearing, and log display to ensure end-to-end functionality.

If the Error Persists

If you still see Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length'):

  • Check Console Output: Share the full console log, especially the SENTENCE_CORPUS debug messages.
  • Verify File Serving: Ensure /static/context_audio_recording.js is served correctly by checking the Network tab in the browser (F12 > Network > Refresh).
  • Clear Cache: Clear the browser cache or use an incognito window to avoid cached versions.

Next Steps

The code should now work with the correct filename and DOM setup. Once the sentence generation works, we can test the full flow. Would you like to proceed with testing, or do you need further assistance with the error? Also, sharing backend.api.routes.log (your log.py) would help align the backend endpoints fully.

class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Bind event listeners this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const limit = 10; const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/data?limit=${limit}`, { method: 'GET' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch logs'); } const logs = await response.json(); console.log("Fetched logs:", logs); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const filename = log.audio_file; const audioUrl = `/api/audio/${filename}`; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.text}</td> <td><audio controls src="${audioUrl}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement('button'); deleteButton.className = 'delete-button'; deleteButton.textContent = 'Delete'; deleteButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); // Append to the Action column this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: 'DELETE' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to delete log'); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.showLogs(); // Refresh the logs table } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; this.logIdToDelete = null; } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const constraints = { audio: { sampleRate: 16000, channelCount: 1, echoCancellation: true, noiseSuppression: true } }; stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia(constraints); this.updateStatus("Microphone access granted"); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; // Disable if no sentence to clear } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } // Generate a sentence by fetching from the backend async generateSentence() { try { this.currentSentence = "Hello it's me"; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio async stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); // Create unique filename with timestamp const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); // this frontend filename is just a recommended name, and isn't required for the backend to save the file const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("text", this.currentSentence); const response = await fetch('/api/logs/audio', { method: 'POST', body: formData }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const result = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Saved: ${result.file_name} - Transcript cleared`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } } // Instantiate the handler window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); // Add event listeners for modal buttons document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); }); <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Context Audio Recording</title> <style> @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron&display=swap'); body { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Arial', sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #050818, #0f1a4d, #1a2a5a, #00a3cc, #00d9a9); background-size: 150% 150%; animation: sciFiGradient 20s ease infinite; position: relative; overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y: auto; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; } @keyframes sciFiGradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } body::before { content: ''; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.03) 0%, transparent 60%); animation: float 25s infinite linear; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .sci-fi-object { position: absolute; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none; } .planet1 { width: 120px; height: 120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #1a2a5a 0%, #00a3cc 70%, transparent 100%); top: 25%; left: 75%; animation: rotate 30s infinite linear; } .planet2 { width: 80px; height: 80px; background: radial-gradient(circle, #2a4494 0%, #00d9a9 70%, transparent 100%); top: 65%; left: 20%; animation: rotate 40s infinite linear reverse; } .planet2::before { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 100px; height: 20px; background: rgba(0, 217, 169, 0.2); top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(30deg); border-radius: 50%; } .spaceship { width: 0; height: 0; border-left: 20px solid transparent; border-right: 20px solid transparent; border-bottom: 40px solid rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.5); top: 45%; left: 80%; } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(45deg); } } @keyframes hover { 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); } 100% { transform: translateY(0); } } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.2rem; text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; animation: pulse 2s infinite alternate; text-align: center; } @keyframes pulse { from { text-shadow: 0 0 6px #00a3cc, 0 0 10px #00d9a9, 0 0 15px #1a2a5a; } to { text-shadow: 0 0 8px #00a3cc, 0 0 12px #00d9a9, 0 0 18px #1a2a5a; } } .button-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1vw; margin: 1vh 0; flex-wrap: wrap; padding-bottom: 1rem; } .control-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #0f1a4d, #00a3cc); border: none; padding: 1.2rem 2.5rem; font-size: 1.2rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.4); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } .control-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .control-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .control-button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; box-shadow: none; } #sentence { margin-top: 2vh; font-size: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5vw; border: 0.2rem solid #00a3cc; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); width: 85%; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.3); } #recordingStatus { margin-top: 1vh; font-size: 1rem; color: #00d9a9; text-shadow: 0 0 4px #00d9a9; } #logsTableContainer { margin-top: 2vh; width: 90%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; overflow-y: auto; max-height: 40vh; padding-bottom: 1rem; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin-top: 1vh; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9), rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9)); border-radius: 1rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 163, 204, 0.2); } th { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00a3cc, #1a2a5a); color: #ffffff; padding: 1.5vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.2rem solid #00d9a9; font-size: 1.2rem; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; } td { padding: 1.2vw; text-align: left; border-bottom: 0.1rem solid #1a2a5a; color: #d0d0d0; font-size: 1rem; } audio { width: 100%; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .delete-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .delete-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9); z-index: 1000; justify-content: center; align-items: center; overflow-y: auto; } .modal-content { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(15, 26, 77, 0.9), rgba(5, 8, 24, 0.9)); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.5); text-align: center; width: 90%; max-width: 400px; color: #cc0000; text-shadow: 0 0 5px #cc0000; animation: fadeIn 0.3s; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .modal-content h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .modal-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #800000, #cc0000); border: none; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; color: #ffffff; border-radius: 0.3rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s; box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(204, 0, 0, 0.4); } .modal-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } .modal-button:active { transform: scale(0.95); } .modal-button.cancel { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #424242, #757575); } @media (max-width: 768px) { #sentence { width: 95%; } .control-button { font-size: 1rem; padding: 1rem 2rem; } th { font-size: 1rem; padding: 2vw; } td { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 1.5vw; } .button-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 1vh; } #logsTableContainer { width: 100%; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem; } .sci-fi-object { display: none; /* Hide on mobile to reduce lag */ } } @media (max-width: 480px) { body { padding-top: 2rem; } h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin: 1rem 1rem 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } #sentence { width: 100%; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 2.5vw; } .control-button { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; } th { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 2.5vw; } td { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 2vw; } #recordingStatus { font-size: 0.9rem; } .delete-button { font-size: 0.7rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem; } .modal-content { padding: 1rem; } .modal-button { font-size: 0.8rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } } </style> </head> <body> <div class="sci-fi-object planet1"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object planet2"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object spaceship"></div> <div class="sci-fi-object alien"></div> <h1>Context Audio Recording</h1> <div class="button-container"> <button id="generateSentence" class="control-button">Generate Sentence</button> <button id="startRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Start Recording</button> <button id="stopRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Stop Recording</button> <button id="saveRecording" class="control-button" disabled>Save Recording</button> <button id="showLogsButton" class="control-button">Show Logs</button> </div> <div id="sentence">Click "Generate Sentence" to start.</div> <div id="recordingStatus"></div> <div id="logsTableContainer"> <h3>Recording Logs</h3> <table id="logsTable"> <thead> <tr> <th>ID</th> <th>Sentence</th> <th>Audio File</th> <th>Timestamp</th> <th>Action</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="logsTableBody"></tbody> </table> </div> <div id="deleteModal" class="modal"> <div class="modal-content"> <h2>Confirm Deletion</h2> <p>Are you sure you want to delete this recording?</p> <div class="modal-buttons"> <button id="confirmDelete" class="modal-button">Yes</button> <button id="cancelDelete" class="modal-button cancel">No</button> </div> </div> </div> <script src="/static/context_audio_recording.js"></script> </body> </html> it seems like we don't have the clearCurrentSentence button in the html and there may be an error from this.updateButtonStates Error generating sentence: Cannot set properties of null (setting 'disabled') Recording Logs

Thank you for providing the updated code and identifying the issues. The errors you're encountering—Error generating sentence: Cannot set properties of null (setting 'disabled') and the missing clearCurrentSentence button—point to specific problems in the JavaScript and HTML integration. Let’s address these step-by-step.

Identified Issues

  1. Missing clearCurrentSentence Button in HTML:
    • The HTML lacks a <button id="clearSentence"> element, which causes this.clearSentenceBtn to be null when the RecordingHandler constructor runs. This leads to the Cannot set properties of null (setting 'disabled') error in updateButtonStates because it tries to set disabled on this.clearSentenceBtn.
  2. updateButtonStates Error:
    • The error occurs because updateButtonStates is called (e.g., in generateSentence or initial setup) before all DOM elements are properly initialized or validated. Since this.clearSentenceBtn is null, attempting to set disabled on it fails.
  3. Potential DOM Loading Issue:
    • The script instantiation occurs outside DOMContentLoaded, which might cause the constructor to run before the DOM is fully loaded, though the <script> tag is at the bottom of the body, mitigating this risk. However, moving instantiation to DOMContentLoaded will ensure robustness.
  4. Endpoint and Method Misalignment:
    • The generateSentence method now hardcodes a sentence ("Hello it's me") instead of using SENTENCE_CORPUS, and the saveRecording method uses /api/logs/audio with text, which may not match your backend (/context-audio-recording/save with sentence).

Fixes

  1. Add clearSentence Button to HTML:
    • Include the missing button in the button-container.
  2. Enhance DOM Validation:
    • Add checks in the constructor to throw an error if any required DOM element is missing, preventing downstream failures.
  3. Move Instantiation to DOMContentLoaded:
    • Ensure the RecordingHandler is instantiated only after the DOM is fully loaded.
  4. Fix updateButtonStates and Align Endpoints:
    • Add null checks in updateButtonStates and align the saveRecording endpoint with the backend.

Updated frontend/context_audio_recording.js

javascript
class RecordingHandler { constructor() { // Initialize DOM elements with null checks this.generateSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("generateSentence"); this.startRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("startRecording"); this.stopRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("stopRecording"); this.saveRecordingBtn = document.getElementById("saveRecording"); this.clearSentenceBtn = document.getElementById("clearSentence"); this.showLogsBtn = document.getElementById("showLogsButton"); this.sentenceDiv = document.getElementById("sentence"); this.recordingStatus = document.getElementById("recordingStatus"); this.logsTableBody = document.getElementById("logsTableBody"); this.deleteModal = document.getElementById("deleteModal"); this.confirmDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("confirmDelete"); this.cancelDeleteBtn = document.getElementById("cancelDelete"); // Validate DOM elements if (!this.generateSentenceBtn || !this.startRecordingBtn || !this.stopRecordingBtn || !this.saveRecordingBtn || !this.clearSentenceBtn || !this.showLogsBtn || !this.sentenceDiv || !this.recordingStatus || !this.logsTableBody || !this.deleteModal || !this.confirmDeleteBtn || !this.cancelDeleteBtn) { console.error("One or more DOM elements not found:", { generateSentenceBtn: this.generateSentenceBtn, startRecordingBtn: this.startRecordingBtn, stopRecordingBtn: this.stopRecordingBtn, saveRecordingBtn: this.saveRecordingBtn, clearSentenceBtn: this.clearSentenceBtn, showLogsBtn: this.showLogsBtn, sentenceDiv: this.sentenceDiv, recordingStatus: this.recordingStatus, logsTableBody: this.logsTableBody, deleteModal: this.deleteModal, confirmDeleteBtn: this.confirmDeleteBtn, cancelDeleteBtn: this.cancelDeleteBtn }); throw new Error("Required DOM elements are missing"); } // Initialize state this.mediaRecorder = null; this.audioChunks = []; this.currentSentence = ""; this.logIdToDelete = null; // Bind event listeners this.generateSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.generateSentence()); this.startRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.startRecording()); this.stopRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.stopRecording()); this.saveRecordingBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.saveRecording()); this.showLogsBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.showLogs()); this.clearSentenceBtn.addEventListener("click", () => this.clearCurrentSentence()); // Initial setup this.showLogs(); this.updateStatus("Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } // Fetch and display logs async showLogs() { try { this.updateStatus("Fetching logs..."); const limit = 10; const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/data?limit=${limit}`, { method: 'GET' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch logs'); } const logs = await response.json(); console.log("Fetched logs:", logs); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; if (logs.length === 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `<td colspan="5">No logs found</td>`; this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); } else { logs.forEach(log => { const filename = log.audio_file; const audioUrl = `/api/audio/${filename}`; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` <td>${log.id}</td> <td>${log.text}</td> <td><audio controls src="${audioUrl}"></audio></td> <td>${new Date(log.timestamp).toLocaleString()}</td> <td></td> <!-- Placeholder for delete button --> `; const deleteButton = document.createElement('button'); deleteButton.className = 'delete-button'; deleteButton.textContent = 'Delete'; deleteButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.showDeleteConfirmation(log.id)); row.children[4].appendChild(deleteButton); this.logsTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } } else { console.error("logsTableBody element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Logs loaded successfully"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching logs:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error fetching logs: ${error.message}`); if (this.logsTableBody) { this.logsTableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5">Error loading logs</td></tr>`; } } } // Show delete confirmation modal showDeleteConfirmation(logId) { this.logIdToDelete = logId; if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = "flex"; } else { console.error("deleteModal element not found"); } } // Confirm deletion of a log async confirmDelete() { if (this.logIdToDelete) { try { this.updateStatus("Deleting log..."); const response = await fetch(`/api/logs/delete/${this.logIdToDelete}`, { method: 'DELETE' }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to delete log'); } this.updateStatus("Log deleted successfully"); if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; } this.showLogs(); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting log:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error deleting log: ${error.message}`); } } } cancelDelete() { if (this.deleteModal) { this.deleteModal.style.display = 'none'; } this.logIdToDelete = null; } // Start recording audio async startRecording() { try { if (!navigator.mediaDevices) throw new Error("MediaDevices API not available"); const constraints = { audio: { sampleRate: 16000, channelCount: 1, echoCancellation: true, noiseSuppression: true } }; const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia(constraints); // Fixed 'stream' variable this.updateStatus("Microphone access granted"); this.mediaRecorder = new MediaRecorder(stream); this.audioChunks = []; this.mediaRecorder.ondataavailable = (event) => { this.audioChunks.push(event.data); }; this.mediaRecorder.onstop = () => { this.updateStatus("Recording stopped. Click 'Save' to store."); this.updateButtonStates(false); }; this.mediaRecorder.start(); this.updateStatus("Recording..."); this.updateButtonStates(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error starting recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error accessing microphone: ${error.message}`); } } updateButtonStates(isRecording) { if (this.startRecordingBtn) this.startRecordingBtn.disabled = isRecording || !this.currentSentence; if (this.stopRecordingBtn) this.stopRecordingBtn.disabled = !isRecording; if (this.saveRecordingBtn) this.saveRecordingBtn.disabled = !this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence; if (this.clearSentenceBtn) this.clearSentenceBtn.disabled = !this.currentSentence; // Safe check } // Update status message updateStatus(message) { if (this.recordingStatus) { this.recordingStatus.textContent = message; console.log("Status:", message); } else { console.error("recordingStatus element not found"); } } // Generate a sentence async generateSentence() { try { this.updateStatus("Generating sentence..."); this.currentSentence = "Hello it's me"; // Hardcoded for now if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = this.currentSentence; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence generated. Ready to record."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating sentence:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error generating sentence: ${error.message}`); } } // Stop recording audio async stopRecording() { if (this.mediaRecorder && this.mediaRecorder.state === "recording") { this.mediaRecorder.stop(); this.mediaRecorder.stream.getTracks().forEach(track => track.stop()); this.mediaRecorder = null; } } // Save the recording to the server async saveRecording() { if (!this.audioChunks.length || !this.currentSentence) { this.updateStatus("No recording or sentence to save."); return; } try { this.updateStatus("Saving recording..."); const wavBlob = new Blob(this.audioChunks, { type: "audio/wav" }); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); const filename = `recording_${timestamp}.wav`; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("audio", wavBlob, filename); formData.append("sentence", this.currentSentence); // Changed from 'text' to 'sentence' formData.append("timestamp", new Date().toISOString()); const response = await fetch("/context-audio-recording/save", { // Changed from '/api/logs/audio' method: "POST", body: formData, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to save recording"); } const result = await response.json(); this.updateStatus(`Saved: ${result.file_name || result.id} - Transcript cleared`); this.clearCurrentSentence(); this.showLogs(); this.updateButtonStates(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving recording:", error); this.updateStatus(`Error saving recording: ${error.message}`); } } // Clear the current display sentence clearCurrentSentence() { this.currentSentence = ""; this.audioChunks = []; if (this.sentenceDiv) { this.sentenceDiv.textContent = "Click 'Generate Sentence' to start."; } else { console.error("sentenceDiv element not found"); } this.updateStatus("Sentence cleared."); this.updateButtonStates(false); } } // Instantiate the handler inside DOMContentLoaded document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => { try { console.log("DOM fully loaded, instantiating RecordingHandler..."); window.recordingHandler = new RecordingHandler(); const recordingHandler = window.recordingHandler; recordingHandler.confirmDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.confirmDelete()); recordingHandler.cancelDeleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => recordingHandler.cancelDelete()); } catch (error) { console.error("Error initializing RecordingHandler:", error); } });
